description: [China Chopper](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0020)'s server component can perform brute force password guessing against authentication portals.(Citation: FireEye Periscope March 2018)

external_references.description: FireEye. (2018, March 16). Suspected Chinese Cyber Espionage Group (TEMP.Periscope) Targeting U.S. Engineering and Maritime Industries. Retrieved April 11, 2018.
